rooms.name: Engineering
rooms.description: This is the engineering room, where the Engineering Officer works.

rooms.name: Engine Room
rooms.description: This is the engine room. The internally accessible parts of the drive array are here.

rooms.name: Life Support
rooms.description: The life support systems are managed and maintained in this room.

rooms.name: Systems Hallway
rooms.description: I am in the systems hallway. This connects the rooms on the Engineering Deck.

rooms.name: Ramp A
rooms.description: This is hte ramp that connects the Engineering Deck with the Crew Deck.

rooms.name: Main Hallway
rooms.description: This is the main hallway, which connects all of the rooms on the Crew Deck.

rooms.name: Lavatory
rooms.description: I am in the crew's lavatory. It is surprisingly messy.

rooms.name: Hypersleep Pods
rooms.description: The hypersleep pods are in this room. The crew are all in their pods. The readouts all display warnings.

rooms.name: Crew Quarters
rooms.description: These are the crew quarters. There are several bunks and some foot lockers.

rooms.name: Mess Hall
rooms.description: I am in the mess hall. There are two tables and several chairs, with a small kitchen and pantry in the back.

rooms.name: Medical Bay
rooms.description: This is the medical bay, where the medical officer treats illnesses and injuries.

rooms.name: Docking Bay
rooms.description: This is the docking bay. It is currently locked down.

rooms.name: Security
rooms.description: This is the security office. The security officer monitors the ship and docking bay here.

rooms.name: Ramp B
rooms.description: This is the ramp that connects the Crew Deck and the Command Deck.

rooms.name: Bridge
rooms.description: This is the bridge, the command center of the ship.

rooms.name: Communications
rooms.description: This the communications room. The equipment is intact but non-functional.

rooms.name: Navigation
rooms.description: This is the navigation officer's office. The current course is set for Proxima Centauri b.

rooms.name: Bridge Hallway
rooms.description: This is the bridge hallway. It leads from the bridge to the captain's quarters.

rooms.name: Captain's Quarters
rooms.description: I am in the captain's quarters. The captain's office and bed are here.

items.name: Desk
items.description: There is nothing remarkable about the desk.

items.name: Lamp
items.description: It is a lamp meant to light the room.

items.name: Lever
items.description: There is a lever inside the panel.

items.name: Partially open panel
items.description: There is an electrical panel on the wall. The door is partially open.

items.name: Plasma Cutter
items.description: It is a plasma cutter, meant for cutting through metal. It can also be used for welding.

items.name: Computer
items.description: This is the computer used to manage life support systems.

items.name: Clipboard
items.description: This is a clipboard with notes about the life support systems.

items.name: Notes
items.description:
The notes record maintenance on the life support systems. The last entry says:
'Life support systems failing. Suspect sabotage. Returning crew to hypersleep pods to conserve oxygen.'

items.name: Breaker
items.description: There is a circuit breaker on the wall. It appears to be damaged.

items.name: Doorways
items.description: There are several doorways here.

items.name: Screwdriver
items.description: It is a #2 blade screwdriver.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: It is a high intensity discharge flashlight.

items.name: Toilet paper
items.description: Standard issue two-ply toilet paper.

items.name: Soap
items.description: It is soap. The crew rub it on themselves.

items.name: Toilet
items.description: It is a toilet. I do not know what it is for.

items.name: Computer
items.description: This computer is used to manage the hypersleep pods.

items.name: Hypersleep pods
items.description: These are the crew's hypersleep pods, designed to keep them safe during long trips. The pods appear to be dangerously low on power.

items.name: Portable data drive
items.description: It is a portable data drive. It must be connected to a computer with a data cable to be used.

items.name: Foot locker
items.description: This is the foot locker assigned to the engineering officer. It appears to be unlocked.

items.name: Multitool
items.description: This is a multitool. It contains a small blade, a bottle opener, and a #1 phillips-head screw driver.

items.name: Pantry
items.description: This is the main ship's pantry. It is used to store freeze-dried food.

items.name: Scissors
items.description: They are standard kitchen shears.

items.name: Cabinet
items.description: It is a cabinet used to store kitchenware.

items.name: Knife
items.description: It is a large kitchen knife, used for cutting.

items.name: Table
items.description: There is an empty surgical table in the room.

items.name: Bed
items.description: It is a bed for patients.

items.name: Hypodermic needle
items.description: This is a large hypodermic needle. It is full, and the label reads 'experimental'.

items.name: Clipboard
items.description: This is the medical officer's clipboard. It contains notes on various patients.

items.name: Doctor's notes
items.description:
These are the medical officer's notes. All crew members have recent exams. They end: 'Final entry:
All crew members infected by unknown pathogen. Untested cure developed, but must be administered to all crew members through automatic intravenous system.'

items.name: Computer
items.description: This is the medical officer's computer.

items.name: Computer
items.description: This is the docking bay computer. It is displaying a list of error messages and appears unusable.

items.name: Bay Door
items.description: This is the inner docking bay door. It is currently sealed.

items.name: Bay Door Control
items.description: It is the bay door control panel. It requires an access card to activate.

items.name: Data Cable
items.description: It is a standard-issue data cable for connectiong data drives to computers.

items.name: Computer
items.description: This is the security officer's computer. It contains the security officer's notes. It requires a key fob to access.

items.name: Security officer's notes
items.description: The security officer's notes are sparse. He states that all of the ship's systems appears to have been thoroughly compromised, and will need to be repaired. The failing life support systems mean that the crew had to return to their hypersleep pods, and must hope for a miracle.

items.name: Shock Bolt Gun
items.description: This is a gun designed to stun. It fires a highly charged electrical bolt.

items.name: Cabinet
items.description: There is a cabinet on the wall behind the computer

items.name: Captain's chair
items.description: This is the captain's chair. It has hardly been used.

items.name: Command console
items.description: This is the command console. Most of the ship's systems can be managed from here.

items.name: Key fob
items.description: This is the security officer's key fob.

items.name: Ship manual
items.description: This is the emergency hard copy of the ship's manual, to be used only if other systems have failed.

items.name: Computer
items.description: This is the computer used by the ship's communications officer. It appears to be offline.

items.name: Comm console
items.description: The ship's communications console. Messages are sent and received here using coded channels.

items.name: Code book
items.description: This contains the coded channels for contacting different ships and organizations. There appears to be a hand-written note.

items.name: Note
items.description: The note simply says: 'Comms encrypted by outside party. Must find code to restore.

items.name: File cabinet
items.description: This is the file cabinet for the navigation officer.

items.name: Clipboard
items.description: It is an unused clipboard.

items.name: Computer
items.description: It is the navigation officer's computer.

items.name: Desk
items.description: The navigation officer's desk. Used for advanced calculations to plot interstellar courses.

items.name: Captain's door
items.description: This is the captain's door. It requires an access key to open.

items.name: Desk
items.description: This is the captain's desk. It contains several drawers.

items.name: Armoire
items.description: The armoire where the captain keeps his clothes.

items.name: Bed
items.description: The captain's bed. It has not been used recently.

items.name: Cabinet
items.description: A cabinet used to store things.

items.name: Access card
items.description: The captain's spare access card. Can access anything that accepts such a card.

items.name: Log book
items.description: The captain's log book.

items.name: Key
items.description: An old fashioned key. Used to open something.
